Name: Juliette
Ingredients: 30 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
7.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Fruity, medium sweet, cognac laced cooler.
Nutrition: One serving of Juliette contains 221 calories
